sense.gloss: stubbornly sticking to old ways, dislike of new things, narrow-mindedness
cramped home, one's humble abode, hovel, pigsty, cottage, squalid hut
bad habit, evil custom, harmful practice
obstinate, stubborn, hard-headed, being incapable of making sound judgments because of a narrow, inflexible and obstinate mentality
stubbornly sticking to old ways, narrow-mindedly rejecting other people's views
obstinate, stubborn, hard-headed, pigheaded, incapable of making sound judgements because of a narrow, inflexible and obstinate mentality
stubborn and mean, obstinate and bigoted
